137b5(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba tshur sheg/ myur du rab tu byung la skyab su 'gro ba zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i
137b6(mdo sde2): phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas slar gsol pa/ theg pa 'di ni theg chen te/ tshogs med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi// theg pa gcig po skyabs
137b7(mdo sde2): gcig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs// chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku// dge 'dun de
137b8(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs kyi ming // dge 'dun gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs// chos dang dge 'dun nyid ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te/ de bzhin gshegs
138a1(mdo sde2): ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te/ de'i srad bdag ni de bzhin/
138a2(mdo sde2): gshegs la skyabasu mchis/ ji ltar shing kun za 'dod pas ni shing kun bza' bya zhes// shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos zla ba ni// 'jig rten
138a3(mdo sde2): dag na bdag la mi phan nad kyang sos mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de 'dra'i rgyus med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus// de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs btang ste/
138a4(mdo sde2): thabs kyi skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang // de lta bu'i sbrang bu gzhan med de// de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
138a5(mdo sde2): stsal pa/ 'on sor me'i phreng ba khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig
138a6(mdo sde2): rten gzhon na gang lags/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gang lags/ 'jig rten na dge sbyong gsal ba gang lags/ 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags/ de nas bcom
138a7(mdo sde2): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang / sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten na skyabs gcig po don
138a8(mdo sde2): dam pa skyabasu ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la bkod de/ de gnyis 'jig rten na skyabs lags te/ gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi gsal
138b1(mdo sde2): ba de dge slong lags sam/ gang skyabs gcig po ma 'tshal ba de dag skyabs sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur/ gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyabasu
138b2(mdo sde2): ma 'tshal be de dag thog ma nas skyabasu 'gro ba 'am ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lta ba la 'gyur/ de ltar skya ba su mchi ba yang gsal bar ma 'tshal na/ sbyin
138b3(mdo sde2): gnas su lta ga la 'gyur/ gang skyabs dang thabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de 'jig rten na gzhon nu mi mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
138b4(mdo sde2): 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod srog gcod pa spang ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni
138b5(mdo sde2): srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi/ nye ba ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to// srog ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye bas te/ de dag gzung
138b6(mdo sde2): nas gag gsol ba de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o// de dag gsod pa 'am yang na rgyags pa bcom ste/ bdag gi slob par gyi'o// bcom//
138b7(mdo sde2): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod brdzun du smra ba spang ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di
138b8(mdo sde2): skad ces gsol to// bdag ni brdzun smra ba spang ba'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to// chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/ bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos bston
139a1(mdo sde2): to de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid de mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang brdzun zhes
139a2(mdo sde2): bgyi'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang 'thun pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o// /
139a3(mdo sde2): bdag 'jig rten du skyes te rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs nas/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob po// gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyod do// bdag 'jig rte/
139a4(mdo sde2): 'chag go bdag gi ni rmad gum nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o// lhag 'tshal lo bdag so shing blang ngo // bdag mig rtsi byug go/ bdag mag rtsa byag gi/ bdag ni
139a5(mdo sde2): sgom mo bdag gnyid 'tshog go/ bdag gi mgo bo breg go/ bdag mal du zhags te nyal lo// rkyed pa na ba zhig byung ngo // bad kan dang khris pa dang rlung dang
139a6(mdo sde2): 'dus pa bzhig byug byung ste/ bdag gi sman btung ngo // bdag ni shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i thams cad ni mi
139a7(mdo sde2): bden pa ste/ ji tsam du thabs kyi bya ba dang / 'jig rten thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs su spyod pa'i rab tu brdzun smra ba'i tshul khrims mi spyod do// de khyod chos
139a8(mdo sde2): bden pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyis nga las nyon cig/ btsun pa me'u gal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid/ don dam pa'i
139b1(mdo sde2): sku rtag pa'i sku// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku/ don dam pa sku/ ther zug gi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ zhi ba'i/
139b2(mdo sde2): sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ de kho na las skyes pa'i sku/ de ci ltar ston/ de bas na mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa
139b3(mdo sde2): thams cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ste/ de bas sangs rgyas shes bya'o// dper na ba glang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i lpags pa be'u ltar byas te/ srid nas be'u gzhan du
139b4(mdo sde2): 'jug pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams su 'bring po zhing spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas chos ston te/ ba glang rdzi dang / ba ltar 'on
139b5(mdo sde2): ba rnams kyang bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa yang / 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ bdag cag kyang 'on
139b6(mdo sde2): ba ste/ shin tu dga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing / bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bor 'gyu ro snyam du sems so// chos de kho na'i gnas
139b7(mdo sde2): la des bdag nyid skul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so// gal te be'u dngos po/
139b8(mdo sde2): bstan na gzhon yang mi rung len tu yang mi rung ste/ ba lang rdzis be'u bso ba ston te/ rtswa spar gang byin nas mi bden pa'i chos la 'dul bar byed do// de bzhin du
140a1(mdo sde2): gal te sangs rgyas kyis ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i sku/ 'jig rten du bstan du zin na sku de sus mthong bar nus te/ ji ltar baglang rdzi'i chang pa
140a2(mdo sde2): ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i byed pa chos rnams bden pa yin/ de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de/ ji tsam du sems thams cad
140a3(mdo sde2): mi bden pa yin pa de tsam du/ bdag kyang brdzun smra bslang ba'i chos mi 'dzin te/ de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
140a4(mdo sde2): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod chang 'thung ba spang ba'i tshul khrims bzung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas slar tshig
140a5(mdo sde2): su bcad pas gsol pa/ chang spong ba'i tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin/ chang las mos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin/ chang 'thung ba ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod/
140a6(mdo sde2): 'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi// bde gshegs snying po theg pa che las skyes// khu ba 'thungs nas skyes bu mngon par 'gyur// de bzhin gsheg
140a7(mdo sde2): ba rtag tu ther zug ces// rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha legs brjod pa// phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
140a8(mdo sde2): 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spong ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas tshigasu bcad pas slar 'di skad
140b1(mdo sde2): ces gsol to// bdag ni 'khrigs pa spang ba'i khrims mi 'dzin// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g.yem chags 'dzin/ ba dan lta bur smad 'tshong khyim du sprod/
140b2(mdo sde2): bud med kun gyi drung du'ang rab tu chags// ting nge 'dzin ni bdag gi chung ma ste// chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags// dpa' zhing bden la
140b3(mdo sde2): dga' ba bdag gi bu// snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste// stong pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim la sogs// mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa dag gi lam// nyon mongs
140b4(mdo sde2): rnams ni bdag gi g.yog lags te// zas ni ldan ngag gsang ba bstan pa lags// bdag gi skyed mos tshal ni gzigs rnams te// byang chub yan lag
140b5(mdo sde2): me tog dag gis brgyan// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste// bdag gis nges pa'i tshig ni sdong po lags// de la sogs pa'i khyim gnas rtse dga'
140b6(mdo sde2): mchog/ byis pa rnams kyi spod yul 'di ma lags// 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'o na sor mo'i
140b7(mdo sde2): phreng ba ma byin par len pa spong ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su gcad pas slar gsol pa/ bdag ni ma
140b8(mdo sde2): byin len pa spong mi 'dzin// gzhan nor rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin// ma byin pa ni byang chub lags shes kyis// de ni sus kyang su'ang maskul te// byang chub
141a1(mdo sde2): shing drung bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyang // khyod kyi rnyed pa med pa de yang 'dzin// de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te/ de ni bla na med pa'i
141a2(mdo sde2): chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod gar dang rol mo spong ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng
141a3(mdo sde2): bas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du gar bgyid de// dri za'i dbyangs sgrog glu blangs blo
141a4(mdo sde2): 'jug te// legaso legs so de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston// legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos// mi sbyin sbyin pa lta bur
141a5(mdo sde2): snyan theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog/ mi 'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang // sil sman dag gis glegs bam la yang mchod pa bgyi// sems can gang rnams/
141a6(mdo sde2): de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa// de dag 'jig rten du ni 'khor mo mi gcig par// phyi dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ de nas bcom
141a7(mdo sde2): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod/ gcig ci zhes slobs shig/ sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to//
141a8(mdo sde2): gcig ce na sems can thams cad ni zas la gnas so zhes/ nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba las tshig smra ste/ theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so// theg
141b1(mdo sde2): pa chen po pa rnams ni rtag tu mi 'dzin zhing brtan pa'o// ci gcig ce na sems can rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// ci gnyis shes
141b2(mdo sde2): na ming gzugs kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba ste/ theg pa chen po la ma lag so// ming gzugs ni de lta lags ste/ ming dang gzugs rnam pa
141b3(mdo sde2): gzhan ma lags so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa ni ming tsam ste/ gzugs dang dbyibs mi rig go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
141b4(mdo sde2): rnams kyi thar pa ni lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i gzugs bzhin no ci gsum zhe na/ tshor ba gsum nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las byung ste/ theg pa
141b5(mdo sde2): chen po pa rnams kyi ma lagaso// tshor ba 'di gsum te gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog/ la mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i thos pa ni tshor
141b6(mdo sde2): ba'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dge 'dun mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba ste/ de gsuM
141b7(mdo sde2): theg pa chen po pa'i ma lags so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshigs ste/ theg pa chen po la de
141b8(mdo sde2): lta bu'i rnam pa mchis/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang dbye ba rnams ni bden pa bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ces bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po la shin tu
142a1(mdo sde2): bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal ni bden pa ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go/ zhes bgyi ba ni shin tu bden gyi 'gog pa ni ma/
142a2(mdo sde2): lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'o zhes pa de ni shin tu bden gyi lam ni ma yin te/ theg pa chen po la 'phags pa'i bden pa de bzhin no// sdug bsngal
142a3(mdo sde2): gyi bya ba bden du lags na/ sdug bsngal rnam bzhi bden par 'gyur te/ dud 'gro dang yi dgas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi de dag kyang 'phags pa'i
142a4(mdo sde2): bden par 'gyur ro// ci lnga zhes na dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la ni ma lags so// dbang po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs
142a5(mdo sde2): pa rtag pa gsal bar lta'o zhes ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni mig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa'o zhes thos nas ma tshang med par de ni rna ba'o// de bzhin
142a6(mdo sde2): gshegs pa rtag pa'i dri bsnams nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni sna'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro myangs nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni
142a7(mdo sde2): lce'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'o zhes sku'o// de'i ro'i mchog thos shing reg nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni lus so// ci drug ces na/ skye mched
142a8(mdo sde2): drug ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la skye mched drug gi rnam pa 'di med do// skye mched drug ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs
142b1(mdo sde2): partag pa gsal bar lta'o zhes 'ong ba'i sgo nas/ rdzogs pa'i sgo nas sgom pa de ni mig gi skye mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i
142b2(mdo sde2): sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni rna ba'i skye mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i snying po rtag pa'i dri tshor ba 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs pa'i ro sgom pa de ni sna'i skye
142b3(mdo sde2): mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lce'i skye mched de// gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi
142b4(mdo sde2): sku'o zhes sku de'i bro dam pa nyan pa dang / reg pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lus kyi skye mched do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba gsal
142b5(mdo sde2): bar ston pa la 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par byed pa 'ong ba'o// sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni yid kyi skye mched do// ci bdun zhe na/ byang chub
142b6(mdo sde2): kyi yan lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la bdun po de dag u
142b7(mdo sde2): dum pa ra'i me tog brgya pa bzhin du rnyed pa bka' ba'i tshig byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/ bdun po de dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas shin tu me tog rgyas/
142b8(mdo sde2): pa bdun no// ci brgyad ce na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po las 'phags pa'i lam yan
143a1(mdo sde2): lag brgyad po yang dag par lta ba la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog go zhes rab tu ston pa ni/ 'phags pa'i
143a2(mdo sde2): lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa che ba thos shing rnam par reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par thob po// /
143a3(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa ther zug g.yung drung gi mchog bsil bar gyur pa shis pa ni sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// de bzhin
143a4(mdo sde2): gshegs pa'i snying po rga ba med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni yan lag brgyad po yin par rig par bya'o// ci dgu zhe na/ mdo sde yang dag dgu zhes nyan thos kyi theg
143a5(mdo sde2): pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di la ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes theg pa gcig ces bya'o// ci bcu zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
143a6(mdo sde2): bcu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin gyi/ mtha' yas pa'i stobs shes
143a7(mdo sde2): bya'o// de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam du med pa ste/ stobs mtha' yas par mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
143a8(mdo sde2): 'das ni mdo sde mtha' yas pa ldem po dag tu ston pa'o// 'di ni lam gcig po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig skyabs gcig bden pa gcig
143b1(mdo sde2): gi phyir 'brang ba/ khams gcig pa 'gro ba gcig pa/ kha dog gcig pa ste de bas na theg pa gcig ces bya'o// gzhan ni thabs kyi bya ba'o de nas bcom/
143b2(mdo sde2): ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so legs so// sor mo'i phreng ba legs so sor mo'i phreng ba khyod de bzhin gshegs
143b3(mdo sde2): pa'i dge slong sor mo'i phreng ba khyod tshur shog/ dge slong sor mo'i ba khyod tshur shog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / sor mo'i phreng ba dge slong ba lo mang du
143b4(mdo sde2): lon pa bzhin thams cad dge sbyong dang 'thun par spyod lam mdzes par gyur to// de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag
143b5(mdo sde2): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos mchi'o zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig byung ma thag tu deng 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa thob bo// bcom
143b6(mdo sde2): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba tshur shog/ mdze ta'i tshal du sems can bya ba mang po sgrol zhing dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du dong ngo // de
143b7(mdo sde2): nas de bzhin gshegs pa so'i mo'i phreng ba dang thabs cig du shwa ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pas mdun
143b8(mdo sde2): du bdar cing bskor te/ nam mkha' la zla ba nya la bzas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i shing mya ngan med pa'i bar du gsheg so// de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i
144a1(mdo sde2): me lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen pos mchod pa cher byas te/ mdze ta'i tshal du 'ongs so//
144a2(mdo sde2): de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal ba'i mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhug so//
144a3(mdo sde2): de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil bzhin du gyur cing / gos ka tsi lin da ka ltar reg na bde ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
144a4(mdo sde2): can bzhin du 'gyur te/ de nas phyogs thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sor mo'i phreng bas/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa seng ge ltar chen po dang
144a5(mdo sde2): thab mo chen po bgyi nas/ sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing chos kyi gtam ston to// sor mo'i phreng ba bdag nyid chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
144a6(mdo sde2): dag deng shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig kye ste/ sor mo'i phreng ba ltar lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyogs cha gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs cha de dang
144a7(mdo sde2): de nas me tog sil ma'i shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab bo// sems can gang gis pad mo'i dri la reg par gyur pa'i sems can de dag nyon mongs pa med par gyur/
144a8(mdo sde2): to// de nas lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen po dang / lha'i bu mo mang pos lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te/
144b1(mdo sde2): rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang dag par sgrubs nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// brgyad bzhin mtshan mar yon tan rgya cher mang // pad mo mchog/
144b2(mdo sde2): rgyas bzhin du zhal yang mdzes// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mdzes pa bzhin// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// thub pa dam pa bdun mtho gzugs mchog/
144b3(mdo sde2): mang // byams mchog phan pa'i yon tan mang po 'chang // pad mo mchod rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu'i thig
144b4(mdo sde2): le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// mtshungs med mchog yangs rgya chen yon tan mang // thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal//
144b5(mdo sde2): nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra ba// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// ther zug dge mchog yon tan rgya chen mang // thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gi mchod/
144b6(mdo sde2): pad mo'i mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// zhi dge mtshungs med mchog yangs
144b7(mdo sde2): yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad mo rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu'i thig le mdzes
144b8(mdo sde2): la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod 'chang tshul khris yon tan mtha' yas 'chang / sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// theg pa gcig 'dzin theg pa chen po ste// byams
145a1(mdo sde2): 'chang sor phreng thogs la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas lus 'dzin mtha' yas dag kyang 'dzin// mtha' yas gsang 'dzin mtha' yan
145a2(mdo sde2): blo gros 'dzin// sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mtha' yas 'od 'chang mtha' yas ldem dag ston// sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag
145a3(mdo sde2): 'tshal lo// mtha' yas sgyu 'chang mtha' yas bdud rnams 'dul/ nyon mongs bye ba rnam par smin byed 'chang // sor phreng thog pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
145a4(mdo sde2): lo// mtha' yas yongasu mya ngan 'das byed cing / mtha' yas skyes ston 'jig rten rjes su 'jug/ dpa' bo mchog 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom/
145a5(mdo sde2): ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na/ de'i don ci lta bu lags/
145a6(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te/ bzhugs pa ji lta bu lags/ da ni thar pa'i sa lags so zhes bka' stsal pa/ tshigs de la dad par
145a7(mdo sde2): bgyir mi rung na/ 'di la de'i gtam tshig su bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan
145a8(mdo sde2): gcig du deng la/ 'di nas byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bskyod du med pa zhes bya ba de
145b1(mdo sde2): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros skyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas/ sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po da ltar
145b2(mdo sde2): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs
145b3(mdo sde2): bzhin du/ ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas so// zhes gsungs na de ji lta bu lags zhes zhus shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i
145b4(mdo sde2): phreng ba legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar/ dag pa bskyod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/
145b5(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das blo gros skyod du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyag rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste/ nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs
145b6(mdo sde2): pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
145b7(mdo sde2): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas bkye ste 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongs su ma 'das par/ de nyid na bzhugs
145b8(mdo sde2): bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mtha' thar pa la/ ji ltar gnas so zhes gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang sor phreng ba la 'di skad
146a1(mdo sde2): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang yin pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
146a2(mdo sde2): de nyid ston gyis rigs kyi bu khyed deng la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des/ bdag cag 'dir ltar kye'o zhes smros shig/ de nas 'jam dpal
146a3(mdo sde2): gzhon nur pA dang / sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal de dge'o zhes smras te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du slar 'ongs
146a4(mdo sde2): so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tshad
146a5(mdo sde2): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtha' yas so// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bdag cag gis mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gash+ye
146a6(mdo sde2): pa blo gros bskyod du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ston to zhes
146a7(mdo sde2): tshig brjod nas bdag cag slar kye na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di na bzhugs bzhin du/ ji ltar ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bstan du gsol/ bcom
146a8(mdo sde2): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ji ltar blo gros skyod du med pa'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas si'i dbang phyug rgyal por gyur cing dga' ba skyod du med pa'i 'jig rten
146b1(mdo sde2): gyi khams na ji ltar gnas/ 'di na 'dug bzhin du de na ji ltar gnas pa 'di ni 'dug pa lam skyes pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas shes ma zer cig sangs rgyas
146b2(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das kyi skud ni mtha' yas so// de bzhin gshegs ni mtha' yas pas 'gyur ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshugs pa med pa'o// de
146b3(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshungs pa med par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dpag tu med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med pa rgyu ba'o// sor mo'i
146b4(mdo sde2): phreng ba ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma skyes par gyur pa/ de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / sangs rgyas ston par 'gyur ro// de nas sor mo'i phreng
146b5(mdo sde2): bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du legs par bshad
146b6(mdo sde2): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya phrag bcur pha rol tu phyin pa sprad pas/ sems can yang dag par sdus
146b7(mdo sde2): te sems can byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i sems can bye ba mang po byang chub la bkod de dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga'i lus bskal pa mang po grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
146b8(mdo sde2): de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas skyes pa'i skar gyur to// sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba'i skur gyur bcom ldan 'das
147a1(mdo sde2): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing 'di nas gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba'i glog
147a2(mdo sde2): gi phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhi
147a3(mdo sde2): bzhes so sor phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig ma byung ba'i glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
147a4(mdo sde2): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par deng la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
147a5(mdo sde2): khams na/ bzhugs te yang dag pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa dang sor me'i phreng bas leg so zhes gsol nas/ dang /
147a6(mdo sde2): pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi rkang pas ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
147a7(mdo sde2): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du zhus pa dang / snga ma bzhin du 'di lta
147b1(mdo sde2): lhags nas/ sor me'i phreng ba dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin
147b2(mdo sde2): gshegs pa ji ltar na ma byung ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba ngas bstan pa la brgya stong mang por
147b3(mdo sde2): pha rol tu phyin pa bcus sems can yang dag par bsdud te/ sngon ma byung ba'i bde ba la rab tu bkod pas/ nga'i bskal pa bye ba mang por tshad med pa grangs med pa'i pha
147b4(mdo sde2): rol tu phyin pa las ma byung ba'i lus su gyur to// sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'das ma bgyis pa'i mtha' la gnas/ bka' stsal pa/
147b5(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog ces bya ba na de bzhin
147b6(mdo sde2): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros mi zad pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la
147b7(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang phyogs kyi log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma
147b8(mdo sde2): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bye ba na/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
148a1(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/
148a2(mdo sde2): ba yang ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
148a3(mdo sde2): zab mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de na za ba mchog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
148a4(mdo sde2): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs
148a5(mdo sde2): logasu gang ga'i klung bye ma drug snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
148a6(mdo sde2): pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyis 'tsho ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du
148a7(mdo sde2): bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/
148a8(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de
148b1(mdo sde2): la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi/
148b2(mdo sde2): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
148b3(mdo sde2): rgyas dri ma med pa'i mchog ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa yang gong ma
148b4(mdo sde2): bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bye ma dgu snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya
148b5(mdo sde2): ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba bla ma'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
148b6(mdo sde2): de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dri shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed
148b7(mdo sde2): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma shar bya zhes bye ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs bdal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs/
148b8(mdo sde2): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
149a1(mdo sde2): nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bro dam pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin
149a2(mdo sde2): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro mchog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcon
149a3(mdo sde2): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya
149a4(mdo sde2): ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'tsho ba'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
149a5(mdo sde2): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'phreng bas bsgom pa
149a6(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dri mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyi de bzhin gshegs
149a7(mdo sde2): ba de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
149a8(mdo sde2): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhe bya ba na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta ma la'i 'dab ma dri zhes bya ba da ltar
149b1(mdo sde2): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyog
149b2(mdo sde2): logs su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
149b3(mdo sde2): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya
149b4(mdo sde2): thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung de drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
149b5(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams a ga ru dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ka ru'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho/
149b6(mdo sde2): zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung
149b7(mdo sde2): bdun gyis bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye mas sgos pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
149b8(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas phye ma'i spos shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig sangs
150a1(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma
150a2(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin
150a3(mdo sde2): gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi
150a4(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
150a5(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas mtshos byin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas
150a6(mdo sde2): kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams krung dang ldan pa de na/ de bzhin ga
150a7(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan
150a8(mdo sde2): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
150a9(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams tshul chen zhes bya ba de na/
150b1(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshe
150b2(mdo sde2): pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
150b3(mdo sde2): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smin pa chen po'i
150b4(mdo sde2): snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi
150b5(mdo sde2): zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi phreng ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
150b6(mdo sde2): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi sbyin pa zhes bya ba da lta bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
150b7(mdo sde2): la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
150b8(mdo sde2): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i
151a1(mdo sde2): snying po zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa
151a2(mdo sde2): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba dang
151a3(mdo sde2): ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho
151a4(mdo sde2): zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang ga'i
151a5(mdo sde2): klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu 'dzin ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
151a6(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas nor bu 'dzin 'chang zhes bya ba da ltar gzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/
151a7(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' ldan zhes bya ba de na de
151a8(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba da lta gzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
151b1(mdo sde2): pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ba snyed kyi 'jig rten bya mas sa
151b2(mdo sde2): nyen gyi khams 'dul ba zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes
151b3(mdo sde2): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang gi'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed
151b4(mdo sde2): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba da
151b5(mdo sde2): ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs
151b6(mdo sde2): logasu gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i blo gros shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
151b7(mdo sde2): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
151b8(mdo sde2): ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
152a1(mdo sde2): 'das pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyan pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes kyi/
152a2(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
152a3(mdo sde2): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
152a4(mdo sde2): gang ga'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig sangs rgyas kyi zhing
152a5(mdo sde2): 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang gA'i klung gsus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu babang po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
152a6(mdo sde2): pa meng da pa ma pa'i ma tha kya sa le/ de gags pa
152a7(mdo sde2): ngas sa gyu dubya
152a8(mdo sde2): sa tho rgyas pa she kya des / de ba gshegs pa sa pa da pa sags shes sa
152b1(mdo sde2): bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung /
152b2(mdo sde2): lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
152b3(mdo sde2): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji
152b4(mdo sde2): ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
152b5(mdo sde2): khams bzang can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho
152b6(mdo sde2): zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su
152b7(mdo sde2): gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten khams mig gi bdag po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs/
152b8(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom
153a1(mdo sde2): #ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten/
153a2(mdo sde2): gyi khams tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kye'i la sa'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/
153a3(mdo sde2): 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i
153a4(mdo sde2): klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lta na sdug pa rnga sgra zhes bya de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
153a5(mdo sde2): pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig
153a6(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rte ni khams pA na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshe
153a7(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sdug pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das
153a8(mdo sde2): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogasu gang ga'i klung gi 'jig rten gyis khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten khams dga'
153b1(mdo sde2): dga' ba 'phel zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' 'phel zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
153b2(mdo sde2): bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogs mtshams
153b3(mdo sde2): logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes par sdug ces na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
153b4(mdo sde2): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshes pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji
153b5(mdo sde2): ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogs 'tshams log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
153b6(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar
153b7(mdo sde2): bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogs mtshams log su
153b8(mdo sde2): gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yid la byed ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
154a1(mdo sde2): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom
154a2(mdo sde2): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung ke lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
154a3(mdo sde2): gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sems can dang 'dra shig/ zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
154a4(mdo sde2): rgyas sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
154a5(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten khams kyi glog ces bya ba
154a6(mdo sde2): de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi bla ma zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs
154a7(mdo sde2): ba de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'di
154a8(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid
154b1(mdo sde2): du 'ong ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs/
154b2(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
154b3(mdo sde2): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa la zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhes bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
154b4(mdo sde2): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
154b5(mdo sde2): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i mchog ces bya/
154b6(mdo sde2): ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
154b7(mdo sde2): nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i ro zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
154b8(mdo sde2): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhi ba bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji
155a1(mdo sde2): ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi/
155a2(mdo sde2): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog la dris pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs
155a3(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyog se mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
155a4(mdo sde2): nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i bsil zhes bya ba la dris pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar
155a5(mdo sde2): gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/
155a6(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar phyogs mtshams logasu
155a7(mdo sde2): gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog
155a8(mdo sde2): dpal zhes bya ba la dris pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ba snyed kyi 'dzi//
155b1(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams gser mdog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gsal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas
155b2(mdo sde2): kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshes
155b3(mdo sde2): gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa 'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham
155b4(mdo sde2): log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can
155b5(mdo sde2): gyi 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du smra'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi
155b6(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs chu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin
155b7(mdo sde2): du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
155b8(mdo sde2): gyi khams tshul khrims ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas
156a1(mdo sde2): kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi/
156a2(mdo sde2): khams rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po ce byung de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin
156a3(mdo sde2): du snga'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
156a4(mdo sde2): khams rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
156a5(mdo sde2): nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba de na/
156a6(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
156a7(mdo sde2): nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros grub pa zhes bya ba de na
156a8(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa don grub dpal zhes bya ba la dras shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs
156b1(mdo sde2): gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i/
156b2(mdo sde2): bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
156b3(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skyes bu klung la dga' ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu klu'i snying po la dris shig pa yang gong
156b4(mdo sde2): ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
156b5(mdo sde2): gyi khams spos kyi ro zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos sogs ces bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyog
156b6(mdo sde2): phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
156b7(mdo sde2): spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung rgyad kyi bye ma
156b8(mdo sde2): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams drang po'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa drang po'i dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang /
157a1(mdo sde2): gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
157a2(mdo sde2): khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin thang med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin thang med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sku'o// /
157a3(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
157a4(mdo sde2): yas tsug phud can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin
157a5(mdo sde2): du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
157a6(mdo sde2): 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa yang gong
157a7(mdo sde2): ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
157a8(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i dbang phyag ces bya ba la dris
157b1(mdo sde2): shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
157b2(mdo sde2): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me'i 'od ces bya ba la dris
157b3(mdo sde2): shig pa 'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
157b4(mdo sde2): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byin pa'i snying po
157b5(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du snga'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
157b6(mdo sde2): gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi skye ba zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skye ba'i dbang phyug
157b7(mdo sde2): la dris shig pa yang gong ma bzhin du snga'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
157b8(mdo sde2): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang
158a1(mdo sde2): po che rnam par gnon pa la dris shig pa'am gong ma bzhin du snga'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang /
158a2(mdo sde2): ga'i klung brgyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snod ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
158a3(mdo sde2): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi snod rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu ga
158a4(mdo sde2): gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i dbyings shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
158a5(mdo sde2): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba la dris shig pa 'ang gong ma bzhin du sdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham
158a6(mdo sde2): log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
158a7(mdo sde2): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i da dpal dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
158a8(mdo sde2): de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig/
158b1(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten mthong ba dang bcas pa zhes bya de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158b2(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong ba na dga' ba cher 'phags pa'i rgyal po 'od 'phreng ba rnam par sprul pa'i bkod pa go ca chen po bgos pa/ sa'i dbang
158b3(mdo sde2): phyug rgyal po thams cad la 'od byed snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'ang da ltar 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
158b4(mdo sde2): pa dris shig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad
158b5(mdo sde2): ma dkar po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te//
158b6(mdo sde2): 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa 'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs
158b7(mdo sde2): logs su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu yis me tog kha bye ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshes
158b8(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kha 'byed pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom
159a1(mdo sde2): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi/
159a2(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
159a3(mdo sde2): mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
159a4(mdo sde2): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ud dpal
159a5(mdo sde2): mthing ka zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs ste/ 'tsho
159a6(mdo sde2): zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhes 'di nas steng gi phyogs log su gang
159a7(mdo sde2): ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
159a8(mdo sde2): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs ste/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
159b1(mdo sde2): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
159b2(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams ku mu ta dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ku mu ta'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar
159b3(mdo sde2): bzhugs ste/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sted
159b4(mdo sde2): gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
159b5(mdo sde2): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya
159b6(mdo sde2): thub pa ji ltar gnas pa 'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs lo gsu gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa/
159b7(mdo sde2): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ko kang sil ka zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkra shis thams cad kyi
159b8(mdo sde2): rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
160a1(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsod
160a2(mdo sde2): nams kyi stegs can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams kyi stegs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba da
160a3(mdo sde2): ltar bzhugs ste 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og
160a4(mdo sde2): gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i tshul zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
160a5(mdo sde2): pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
160a6(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stag gi phug ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
160a7(mdo sde2): stag tu sgra sgrogs shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa/
160a8(mdo sde2): na 'jig rten gyi khams shing sa ha ka ra zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ha ka ra me tog rlung zhes
160b1(mdo sde2): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten/
160b2(mdo sde2): gyi khams rgyal ldan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las rgyas par 'dul ba
160b3(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten
160b4(mdo sde2): khams ye shes mi chags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa chen po'i
160b5(mdo sde2): rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
160b6(mdo sde2): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byig 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkha'
160b7(mdo sde2): 'byings rtse mo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klang bdan gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
160b8(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams ltad mo che zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri mo thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
161a1(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
161a2(mdo sde2): gyi khams blo gros 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po
161a3(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i tho
161a4(mdo sde2): gros zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og
161a5(mdo sde2): gi phyogs logs su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
161a6(mdo sde2): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba de ltar bzhags ste/ 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de
161a7(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na yongs su mya ngan la 'das par bzhags pa de bzhin gshegs
161a8(mdo sde2): pa thams cad kyi tshig gi dpes brgyan pa'i mthar yang dag pa'i mthar gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod de nga la
161b1(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de la dris shig/ khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs
161b2(mdo sde2): pa de'i mtshan the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom
161b3(mdo sde2): ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis
161b4(mdo sde2): ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dong ste rtag tu dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod
161b5(mdo sde2): pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis mi mjed kyi 'jig
161b6(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams nas zhugs de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i zhabs drung nas 'dir mchis so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i zhabs kyi drung du yang
161b7(mdo sde2): phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs ste mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin du thar pa'i
161b8(mdo sde2): mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa de dag thams cad la zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'di skad du bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
162a1(mdo sde2): pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dang gcig gis de la zhugs shig ces gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang //
162a2(mdo sde2): rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis la the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig ces bdag cag 'dir
162a3(mdo sde2): kyis ste mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing mya ngan las ma 'das par ji ltar na
162a4(mdo sde2): thar pa'i mtha' la gnas zhes zhus pa dang / de gnyis kyi tshig sten nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu myur du slar log
162a5(mdo sde2): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa des the tshom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te tha dad pa ma yin no// de ltar shAkya
162a6(mdo sde2): thub pa ni tshad med do zhes gsungs nas slar bkye'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la leg spro gsol te sor mo'i phreng ba dang lhan
162a7(mdo sde2): cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
162a8(mdo sde2): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshad med par 'dzin pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/ shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs
162b1(mdo sde2): pa des khyed kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par 'gyur gyis/ khyed deng shig ces de dag gis bdag cag kyang slar bkye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
162b2(mdo sde2): ba/ nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin no// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de gsung ngam de dag gsol pa/ de gcig gsung bzhin/ de bzhin gsheg
162b3(mdo sde2): pa de dag thams cad gsungs ste/ tha mar bdag cag gis zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te gcig go zhes
162b4(mdo sde2): gsung ngo // bka' stsal pa de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ci 'dra/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa de
162b5(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag cag gis phyin pa thams cad gram pa dang / gyo mo thams cad ma mchis pa lag mthil bzhin du
162b6(mdo sde2): mnyam pa ka tsa lin de ka bzhin du reg na bde ba/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ltar snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bud med ma
162b7(mdo sde2): mchis pas/ theg pa dam pa gcig ste/ theg pa gzhan la mi 'jug go// bka' stsal pa de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi mtshan rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
162b8(mdo sde2): bu mo gang / kha ton legs par byed dam 'dri 'am nyan kyang rung ba sting ngam brjod dam/ gzhan gyi phyir phyi 'am bdag gis brjod na/ bdag 'jigs pa thams
163a1(mdo sde2): cad med par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
163a2(mdo sde2): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / dri za la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so// thos nas la la srang rab 'gyur des/ 'gro ba bzhi bcad pa yin/ byang chub sem
163a3(mdo sde2): sems dpa' ma skyes pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi rgyu thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // sor mo'i phreng ba gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid ngo mtshar ni/
163a4(mdo sde2): gzungs mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo sde chen po las sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu gcig ste/ nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin no zhes rgya cher bshad do// /
163a5(mdo sde2): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bsngags pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang tshad med pa ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163a6(mdo sde2): gzugs kyi sku yang mtha' yas grangs med de// de lta bu'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la/ mi rtag pa dang nad lta ga la 'byung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag
163a7(mdo sde2): pa mtha' yas pa tsa ba dang bcas rgyu dang rkyen du bcas pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad khyed la brgya cher bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams na skye bo rnams mi dge bas na/ sangs
163a8(mdo sde2): rgyas thams cad kyang 'jig rten khams 'di'i rgyal po mi bzhed do// mi dge ba dge ba la dgod pa'i phyir/ nga'i lus ma skyes pa'i skur gyur to// nga'i lus bskal
163b1(mdo sde2): pa bye ba grangs med pa mang por dam chos bsrung ba'i phyir nga'i lus gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed kyi lus re re yang bcad btubs bcom nas byin pas/ nga'i lus
163b2(mdo sde2): las mi shigs pa 'dus ma byas kyi lus mtshungs pa med par gyur to// bskal pa bye ba mang por dpal po ltar 'dug te/ gnas mang por gang ga'i klung gi bye
163b3(mdo sde2): ma snye kyi lus mang po btang ste/ lus re re yang bskal pa bye ba mang por dpal po ltar 'dug bcing bka' ba spyad pas/ nga'i lus rga ba med pa'i skur gyur/
163b4(mdo sde2): to// bskal pa bye ba mang por grangs med par nga nad kyi bskal pa bar mar skyes ste nga'i lus re re yang bstan dam par 'gyur nas/ gang ga'i klung gi bye
163b5(mdo sde2): ma snyed kyi sems can rnams la phan btags pas na/ nga'i lus nad med pa'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba
163b6(mdo sde2): mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po lhogs nad zhi bar byas te/ theg pa gcig pa'i khu ba blud pas na/ nga'i lus mi 'chi ba'i skur gyur to// ngas
163b7(mdo sde2): bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can ma bye ba mang po'i nyon mongs pa bye ba mang po dri ma bskul nas shin tu dka' ba bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs
163b8(mdo sde2): pa'i snying po snyan pas na/ nga'i lus nyon mongs pa med pa'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du skal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par
164a1(mdo sde2): sems can yi dgas bye ba mang po skom zhing ltogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byas te/ theg pa gcig pa'i ros tshim par byas pas na/ gang
164a2(mdo sde2): ga'i klung mang po'i bye ma snyed du/ nga'i lus zag pa med pa'i skur gyur to// tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med
164a3(mdo sde2): par lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po la ma dang sring mo dang bu bzhin du sdug par byas pas na/ nga'i lus gnod pa med pa'i skur gyur to// nga
164a4(mdo sde2): tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po la mi bden par smra ba rnams/ theg
164a5(mdo sde2): pa chen po bden pa la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus bden pa rtag pa'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs
164a6(mdo sde2): med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po chos ma yin pa byed pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam pa la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus chos kyi skur gyur/
164a7(mdo sde2): to// nga tshe rabs mang por gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bsko pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po log par lta ba'i dbang du gyur
164a8(mdo sde2): ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus shin tu bde ba'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po
164b1(mdo sde2): grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po 'jig rten skrag par gyur pa'i rnams 'jigs pa med pa la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus dge ba'i
164b2(mdo sde2): skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po mya
164b3(mdo sde2): ngan las mang por gyur pa rnams mya ngan med pa'i chos la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus mya ngan dang bral ba'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye
164b4(mdo sde2): ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can mang por gzhan gyi chung ma la chags pa'i rnams/ tshul khrims chen po
164b5(mdo sde2): la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i skur gyur to// nga'i lus gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par
164b6(mdo sde2): sems can bye ba mang po skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams bsdus te/ rab tu spangs pas dam pa'i chos la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus shag shig med de/ shag
164b7(mdo sde2): shig med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems
164b8(mdo sde2): can bye ba mang po dbul por gyur pa rnams/ chos kyi nor dang gter byin pas na nga'i lus tshul med pa las tshul gyis chos kyi skur gyur to// nga che rabs
165a1(mdo sde2): mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lnga dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po 'dod pa'i
165a2(mdo sde2): dbang du gyur pa rnams/ nyon mongs pa med pa la bkod pas/ nga'i lus gcer ba dang bral zhing gcer ba med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang
165a3(mdo sde2): mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ skal ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po nyon mongs bsgral shig/ sbrul bdug
165a4(mdo sde2): pa'i nad med par byas nas/ nga'i lus nad 'go ba med cing nad bral ba'i chos kyi skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal
165a5(mdo sde2): pa bye ba mang po grangs pa'i lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba snyed du/ bskal pa na tsa lag med par pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi rtsa lag du byas pas/ nga'i lus
165a6(mdo sde2): ma byas pa'i chos gsal ba'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang por grangs med pa'i lha dang mir bcas pa'i
165a7(mdo sde2): sems can bye ba mang po rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi gtam bskyed pas na/ nga'i lus ci'ang med pa la skur gyur to//
165a8(mdo sde2): nga tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs
165b1(mdo sde2): kha'i gsang ba dang ngo mtshar la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus ngo mtshar gyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ skal pa bye ba mang /
165b2(mdo sde2): po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams la sems rgyas su sbyor du btsud pas/ nga'i lus tshad med dpag tu med pa'i mchog
165b3(mdo sde2): dam pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba
165b4(mdo sde2): rnams bsgral ba'i phyir rigs de dang der skyes pa bstan te/ rab tu bsgral bas na/ nga'i lus mchog dam pa'i bskur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang por gang
165b5(mdo sde2): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral
165b6(mdo sde2): te/ byang chub pa la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus nad med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang por gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba
165b7(mdo sde2): mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po rnams yan lag ma tshang ba'i lus kyis/ 'jig rten gyi phyir 'gro bar bya ste sems can mang po byang chub sems
165b8(mdo sde2): dpa' la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus bla na med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po
166a1(mdo sde2): grangs med par ngas 'jig rten rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa'i dbyings ma bcas ste/ sems can thams cad phan
166a2(mdo sde2): par bstan pas na/ nga'i lus rtag pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par ngas
166a3(mdo sde2): tshul khrims bsrung ba na lha'i bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu mo dang / 'jig rten pa bzang po mthong yang sems ma btang bas/ nga'i lus mi 'jigs pa'i skur gyur
166a4(mdo sde2): to// nga tshe ra bas mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par/ sems can bye ba mang po thams cad kyi bla ma'i chung ma
166a5(mdo sde2): dang / phu nu bo'i chung ma dang / bud med thams cad la chags par ma byas pa na/ nga'i lus mi 'jigs pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang
166a6(mdo sde2): po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams kyi nyes pa dang mtha' yas pa zad
166a7(mdo sde2): par byas pas na/ nga'i lus mtshungs pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i skur gyur to// ngas tshe rabs mang po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bskal pa bye ba mang
166a8(mdo sde2): po grangs med par/ sems can bye ba mang po dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams/ chos zab mo la bkod pas na/ nga'i lus zab mo'i skur gyur to// /
