341a2(mdo sde2): ba rtag tu med pa/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod pa mi len pa/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa/ rang sangs rgyas mi shes pa/ byang chub
341a3(mdo sde2): sems kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod kyis gus pa skyed par bya'o// sti stang dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa la ni
341a4(mdo sde2): shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byam pa skyed/ ye shes rab tu byung rig pa skye mngon par shes pa mngon tu gyur/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dun na/
341a5(mdo sde2): gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos ji ltar ston ce na/ nyi mas byin chos thams cad ni nam mkha'
341a6(mdo sde2): la bris pa bzhin du dngos po med pa ste/ chos de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' la bris pa ni
341a7(mdo sde2): ma byung / mi 'byung de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes
341a8(mdo sde2): yang nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyi 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes pa'o// /
341b1(mdo sde2): rnam par shes pa yang mi skye'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang ma
341b2(mdo sde2): 'gags pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang ma 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni bris
341b3(mdo sde2): pa ni mi 'gro ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs mi 'ong mi 'gro ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par yang mi 'gro ba'o// nyi mas byin 'di
341b4(mdo sde2): lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes
341b5(mdo sde2): pa ma skyes ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma 'phos ma skyes ste/ tshor ba dang
341b6(mdo sde2): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa 'ang ma skyes pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung kun nas ma byung ba de
341b7(mdo sde2): bzhin du gzugs kyang ma byung kun nas ma byung ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'ang ma byung kun nas ma byung ngo // nyi mas
341b8(mdo sde2): byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes shing med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes shing med pa ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
342a1(mdo sde2): dang // rnam par shes pa 'ang ma skyes shing med pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma grub mngon par/
342a2(mdo sde2): ma grub pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma grub mngon par ma grub ste/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma grub mngon
342a3(mdo sde2): par ma grub po// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang brjod du med pa ma yin te/ tshor
342a4(mdo sde2): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa
342a5(mdo sde2): rtag pa med cing gtags ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang gtags pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gtag
342a6(mdo sde2): pa med cing gtags pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nem mkha' la bris pa ni tha nyid tsam ste nam mkha' la bris pa ni tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma
342a7(mdo sde2): yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na
342a8(mdo sde2): nam mkha' la la bris ni 'di ltar kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob las na mkha' la bris pa bzhin ma yin pa de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam
342b1(mdo sde2): ste kun rdzob las gzugs gzhan ma yin tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las rnam par shes
342b2(mdo sde2): ba'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di lta ste ming tsam ste/ ming tsam las nam mkha' las bris
342b3(mdo sde2): pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di ltar du yang 'di ltar ming can ste/ ming
342b4(mdo sde2): tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa
342b5(mdo sde2): tsam las nam mkha' las bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yino// /
342b6(mdo sde2): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar rjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin
342b7(mdo sde2): 'di lta ste dben na mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ gtags pa tsam las na mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/
342b8(mdo sde2): gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ gtags pa tsam las gzugs bzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam
343a1(mdo sde2): par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
343a2(mdo sde2): gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'dus shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan
343a3(mdo sde2): ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar
343a4(mdo sde2): du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni brda' tsam ste/ rnga tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
343a5(mdo sde2): du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brda' tsam ste/ brda' tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas
343a6(mdo sde2): byin 'di lta ste dper na/ tshig gang gis na mkha' la bri bar brjod pa ni don dam par mi dmigs par de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
343a7(mdo sde2): dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs/ ma byon pa dang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa/
343a8(mdo sde2): rnams kyang ma dmigs/ nyi mas byin ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa na/ sngas
343b1(mdo sde2): cing 'phangs pa dngos po thams cad yongasu btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur te// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyis rtogs par mi lta'o// /
343b2(mdo sde2): gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi grangasu mi 'gro'o// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni bdags par bya ba ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di
343b3(mdo sde2): la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba las bskyod pa ma yin no// gang ye shes
343b4(mdo sde2): 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni kun
343b5(mdo sde2): nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin/ ma zhi bar
343b6(mdo sde2): spyod pa yang ma yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa grags byin gyis bshad pa lo legaso shin tu bston pa rjesu
343b7(mdo sde2): yi rang ngo // de na skyes bu dam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin de rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i rigs
343b8(mdo sde2): shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di thos kyang ma skrag par skrag par ma gyur/ shin tu skrag/
344a1(mdo sde2): par ma gyur/ ma myos myos par ma gyur pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang bslabs par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin no// de nas
344a2(mdo sde2): bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas rab tu dag
344a3(mdo sde2): ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// // bam po bdun pa'o// /
344a4(mdo sde2): de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
344a5(mdo sde2): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' mchog ces bya ba de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
344a6(mdo sde2): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas skyes bu dgrags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshig su bcad pa 'di
344a7(mdo sde2): dag gsol to// zhi ba'i dbyings la rab zhugs tshul rnams la// mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni legaso legs// gang gis mi mchog shin tu mthong gyur pa// de/
344a8(mdo sde2): ni mi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su// byang chub mchog la mi rnams rab tu 'jug/ gang thos drang srong chen po 'gyur
344b1(mdo sde2): ba dag/ tshul de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs// bde gshegs dag gis rigs la gnas nas su// thub pa sangs rgyas ye shes mthong bar
344b2(mdo sde2): bstod// rgyal bas de yid rab tu dga' bar mdzad// de dag thos nas shin tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba bdag gis ji tsam 'tshal ba rnams// 'dren
344b3(mdo sde2): pa bdag gis chos rnams bshad lags te// ston pas ji ltar chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// 'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol// de la dga'
344b4(mdo sde2): mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa'i// rgyal sras spyod pa gang la spyad pas na// mi'i tso bo 'dren par gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par bstan//
344b5(mdo sde2): thams cad chos shes bya ba mtshan nyid cig/ mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhi bang med mi g.yo yon tan med// spros pa med cing zhi ba 'tsho ba med//
344b6(mdo sde2): kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba stong // dngos po nyid med ci yang med pa ste// 'di ni bstan pas ma yin ston pa med// bshad par med cing 'chad par byed
344b7(mdo sde2): ba'ang med// tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang med// shes pa ma yin par byed pa'ang med// su la'ang ma yin gang gis kyang min te// 'di dag ma byas byed
344b8(mdo sde2): du bcug pa'ang med// sus kyang sgrags pa med pa thos pa'ang med// sus kyang mi shis rnam par shes pa'ang med// 'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ba med/
345a1(mdo sde2): 'di ni zhi ba ma yin rgod par 'ang min// zhi bar mi byed zhi bar byas pa'ang med// byed pa ma yin byed pa med ma yin// sems dpa'
345a2(mdo sde2): med cing tshor bar byed pa'ang med/ 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas pa'ang ma yin// 'pho bas ma yin mi 'pho bas yang ma yin// 'ong ba med cing
345a3(mdo sde2): 'gro ba yod ma yin// 'di ni kun tu mi mchi skye ba 'ang med// skye ba med cing skyed pa'ang ma yin te// 'di ni 'gag pa med la 'gag pa'ang min// 'di
345a4(mdo sde2): ni snyan pa med cing gshig pa'ang med// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shes par gyis// 'dren pa bde gshegs gang dag 'das gyur pa// de dag gi kyang
345a5(mdo sde2): tshul 'di rab tu stan// 'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byon 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa de ltar gang byung ba/
345a6(mdo sde2): de dag kun kyang rgyal ba'i tshul 'di ston// chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jigs par 'gyur// zhi ba'i
345a7(mdo sde2): sa yang rab tu shes 'gyur te// mkhas pas yang dag shes par rab tu bstan// rgyal ba'i thugs sras ji tsam shes pa dag/ 'gro ba brtses pa'i
345a8(mdo sde2): la mya ngan med// de las snying rje bla na med pa skye// 'gro ba kun la byams par shin tu gnas// stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur pas na// rgyal ba'i bstan
345b1(mdo sde2): pa dag la theg pa com// mtshan ma med par gyur pa de dag la// de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod med na/ rlung rnams na mkha' dag la mi thogs bzhin//
345b2(mdo sde2): dpa' bo de yang 'gro bar mi chags so// bskal pa mang po bye bar kun 'khor zhing // sems can bye ba mang la ston par byed// kun tu kun nas nyon mongs
345b3(mdo sde2): mi 'gyur te// de ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus// gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye ba bstan pa te// de dag nyan thos kyis shes smra na yang // ngas ni chos
345b4(mdo sde2): rnams yang dag rab rtogs te// khyod ni 'dren pa min zhes de sla'o// dri ma med pa'i ye shes mig spangs te/ bdag ni the tshom ma lus rnam par byang // stong
345b5(mdo sde2): bar bdag ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ khyod ni gang zag mchog min phan dengs shig/ de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstan pas nas// gang la 'dren pa'i sras rnam
345b6(mdo sde2): gnas pa la// bye ba khrag khrig bdun gyis thub dka' ste// ji ltar ri bo bskyed par mi nus bzhin// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin/ btso
345b7(mdo sde2): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa de dag thos nas/ 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shug thob ste/ dge
345b8(mdo sde2): ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu thos pas ta la bdun srid du na mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
346a1(mdo sde2): bye ba khrag khrig brgyad phrag dpag tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub/
346a2(mdo sde2): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos ste yum gyi lhum su zhugs pa yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa'/
346a3(mdo sde2): bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis bskor cing yum gyi rum du 'gro ba yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu
346a4(mdo sde2): med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong //
346a5(mdo sde2): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la/
346a6(mdo sde2): brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo
346a7(mdo sde2): bskor ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spabral ma jamag tu zad pa rnams spyod lam dpag tu med pas sems can rnams
346a8(mdo sde2): 'dul ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig na phung po lkog ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
346b1(mdo sde2): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang mthong / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin par snang la 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das
346b2(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshig su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// legaso legaso rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa khyod kyis
346b3(mdo sde2): 'di dag chos ston pa// bar snang gnas kyi bya'i rjes bzhin du// mangs bral mtshungs med ci yang ma lags pa// mtshan ma mchis ni mkha' bris
346b4(mdo sde2): pa bzhin// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos ston to// sprul pa dag gi ji ltar bzhin sprul bzhin// yang dag tu na rgyal bas stan ma mchis// sos
346b5(mdo sde2): ka'i dus kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin du// snang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas chos ston te// ston pa gang lags de
346b6(mdo sde2): yang de dang 'dra// sngan chad the tshom nem nur gA byung ba// de yang 'dren pa drung du bral gyur te// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang rig
346b7(mdo sde2): 'gro ba 'gro la sgrol mdzad rnam par shog/ stobs cu dag gi sgrub pa ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog bzang po snang bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgyal ba
346b8(mdo sde2): rkang gnyis tsor gyur te// skye bo ma rtogs rab tu rtogs par bgyi// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang ma gyur to// /
347a1(mdo sde2): thams cad zil gyi gnon pa 'di ci snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa bzhin zhig yin snyam du 'dzin
347a2(mdo sde2): na/ de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpon bzang po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to//
347a3(mdo sde2): de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mis byin no// gang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu blo gros mtshang
347a4(mdo sde2): zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang rigs kyi bu kun tu mdzes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
347a5(mdo sde2): sems dpa' dbang pos byin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' ya su gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no// thams cad
347a6(mdo sde2): zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin snyam du 'dzin
347a7(mdo sde2): na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta
347a8(mdo sde2): bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur te/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang //
347b1(mdo sde2): gzhan gyi mi kri bar 'dod pa dang / bzhan gyi ngor mi lta bar 'dod pa chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i gnyen rnams la sten cing 'grogs par
347b2(mdo sde2): bya/ snyen bkur bya'o// chos nyan pa'i phyir yongasu 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
347b3(mdo sde2): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs skyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyi gnon pa 'dis
347b4(mdo sde2): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snyed lags sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongasu zhu ba zha lags/ de skad
347b5(mdo sde2): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen
347b6(mdo sde2): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dang rtswa dang shing dang / yal ga dang lo ma rnams rdul phra rab du byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' tham
347b7(mdo sde2): cad zil gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings su
347b8(mdo sde2): yong su zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dri ba ni bgrang bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal sngon 'byung
348a1(mdo sde2): pa 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba grang med dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med
348a2(mdo sde2): pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par mongadu
348a3(mdo sde2): dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar
348a4(mdo sde2): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang
348a5(mdo sde2): po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang dge slong dpa'
348a6(mdo sde2): sra zhes bya ba mkhas pa yid gzhungs pa/ bye brag phyed pa rtogs pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
348a7(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim 'gror byed par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
348a8(mdo sde2): rgyal mtshan de la rim 'gror byed par gyur te// des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad bcu'i bar du shin tu
348b1(mdo sde2): gus par byas te/ bshad pa'i rnams kyang gzungasu 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad
348b2(mdo sde2): bcu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gror byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams
348b3(mdo sde2): mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rim gror byed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'ang thams cad mkhyen
348b4(mdo sde2): pa nyid kyis sems kyis snyen bkur byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang / bar ma dang tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa'i
348b5(mdo sde2): yongasu bzung bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
348b6(mdo sde2): de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gror byed pa de dag thams cad
348b7(mdo sde2): la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gror byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar dang tha ma dus gsum
348b8(mdo sde2): du bstan pa rnams yongasu bzung ngo // de'i 'og du zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
349a1(mdo sde2): pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i
349a2(mdo sde2): rgyal po de'i tshe nga'i tshad ni/ bskal bye ba phrag brgyad bcur gyur to// de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sras des bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcu'i bar
349a3(mdo sde2): du yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbying
349a4(mdo sde2): la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha' bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug pa stan to// bskal pa bye ba bcu'i bar du chos// chos thams cad na mkha'
349a5(mdo sde2): la bris pa ltar bu bstan te/ dpa' sras 'byung ba chen po bzhin du gyur kyang srid kyi/ nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams cad ni cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur
349a6(mdo sde2): ba med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sras chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas/ 'di lta bu'i rtsa ba'i shugs mthong ste/ ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
349a7(mdo sde2): shugs thos pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
349a8(mdo sde2): dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong / kha cig ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi
349b1(mdo sde2): 'khor lo skor kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul rnams pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul// kha cig ni tshe 'di'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phung po lhag ma med
349b2(mdo sde2): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal
349b3(mdo sde2): po de la zab mo'i tshi gsu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa byed
349b4(mdo sde2): ba ston dag la// shin tu gus pa chen po skyed nas su// sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis// sems ni nam kyang gzhan du ma bsams te// rtag
349b5(mdo sde2): par yid ni stong pa nyid la gzhan// chos rnams stong par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsams// bdag du
349b6(mdo sde2): smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa// mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan// chos rnams thams cad chu'i zla ba bzhin// de la bdag ni the tsom cang
349b7(mdo sde2): ma mchis// mig 'di dam pa'i don du sbyor bar ni// bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs// mig ma mchis pa rnams ni ma lags te/
349b8(mdo sde2): 'dzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la bslang// nges par sna lce rna ba de bzhin te// las kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags/ de bzhin sems dang
350a1(mdo sde2): sems dpa' 'ang stong pa nyid// sems ni bden zhing rab tu stong pa lags// gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rnam par bden zhing
350a2(mdo sde2): stong // sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste// skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong // de bzhin mkha
350a3(mdo sde2): kyang mkhas pa nyid kyis stong // dbang po 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong // bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste// 'di la 'dzangs pa ma lag
350a4(mdo sde2): 'gro ba rnams kyang bslang // gang na'ang stong par rig par ma mchis par// nam mkha' bar snang bya'i rjes dang mtshungs// gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni
350a5(mdo sde2): ma mchis pa/ de rnams kyang ni gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur// gang gi ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed pa// rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen// rang bzhin med pa
350a6(mdo sde2): de bzhin ji zhig skyed// rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o// thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas// mi 'gyur gtse ba ma mchis zhi
350a7(mdo sde2): ba ste// ji ltar nam mkhas rig pa ma mchis ltar// de la mi 'dzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi bsgral pa// de bzhin chos
350a8(mdo sde2): rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus// tshi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i/ chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan/ gang gis yang dag chos rnams ngas
350b1(mdo sde2): rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba rnams 'dren bsnyen bskur bgyis// gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa// de dag rgyal ba chos nyid tshod ma bgyis// gang
350b2(mdo sde2): gis tshul bzhin du ni chos rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs sti stang bgyis// de dag rgyal ba chos kyang mchod bgyis te/ byang chub dam pa mchog
350b3(mdo sde2): gi 'tshang yang rgya// gang gi tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin// bde gshegs pa'i bstan pa des
350b4(mdo sde2): bzung ste// byang chub dam pa mchog du 'tshang yang rgya// bde bar gshegs pas stong pa nyid bshad de// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung /
350b5(mdo sde2): bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub phyir/ de la mkhas pa the tsom gzhin mi 'byung // bde gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa// chos nyid
350b6(mdo sde2): de ni de ring bdag gis 'tshal// 'dren pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur// shin du skye bo sdug bsngal rnam par grol// 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig
350b7(mdo sde2): pas na// bdag gi di ring chos kyi yab la mchod/ gang slad mi yi gtso bo khyod 'phags pas// de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyab su mchis// de nas
350b8(mdo sde2): byang chub sems dpa' bu sras bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig su bcad pa de dag gis
351a1(mdo sde2): gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzugs dang zhi gnas dang / shes rab
351a2(mdo sde2): kyis sems can thams cad zil kyis mnan to// 'jam dpal de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras su gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzin
351a3(mdo sde2): na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub
351a4(mdo sde2): sems dpa' dpa' sras zhes bya bar gyur to// de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa/
351a5(mdo sde2): rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas/ stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bslab par bya'o// de la slob pa'i tshe'ang sems gang la 'ang mi chags
351a6(mdo sde2): mi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing / thogs pa med pas bya ba gang la dmigs pa de dang de yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nga stong
351a7(mdo sde2): pa 'di la slob pa na/ ye shes ji ltar bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der gyur pa'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob/
351a8(mdo sde2): 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na/ rtag tu snang bar byas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
351b1(mdo sde2): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar
351b2(mdo sde2): gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad 'das pa na/ rin chen 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de la nga la sems can rnams kyis de
351b3(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu 'das pa na/ dge ba bsrugs
351b4(mdo sde2): shes bya ba'i 'jig rten yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad
351b5(mdo sde2): sems dpa' zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
351b6(mdo sde2): yod de de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi phung po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
351b7(mdo sde2): zhing brgya phrag gnyis 'das pa na/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
351b8(mdo sde2): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
352a1(mdo sde2): zhing brgyad brgya 'das pa na/ zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
352a2(mdo sde2): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal por zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum
352a3(mdo sde2): 'das pa na/ sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
352a4(mdo sde2): dbang po'i rgyal por zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na/ sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi kham
352a5(mdo sde2): yod de/ de na nga la sems can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
352a6(mdo sde2): shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri rgya stong 'das pa na me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
352a7(mdo sde2): can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyog
352a8(mdo sde2): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag rgya cu 'das pa na/ zla ba snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de de na nga la sems can rnams
352b1(mdo sde2): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs
352b2(mdo sde2): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba dgu cu 'das pa na/ dus las 'das shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin
352b3(mdo sde2): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi
352b4(mdo sde2): zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshe monyam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnam
352b5(mdo sde2): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten
352b6(mdo sde2): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed phrag sum cu rtsa rgyad 'das pa na/ zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ de
352b7(mdo sde2): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char/ sangs
352b8(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing drug cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems
353a1(mdo sde2): can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dkod pa shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
353a2(mdo sde2): shar gyi phyogs char/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi/ rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ rin po che kun tu gnas pa zhes
353a3(mdo sde2): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ gzi rjid
353a4(mdo sde2): 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
353a5(mdo sde2): 'das pa na/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
353a6(mdo sde2): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs brtul zhugs spyad ces bya bar shes so/ 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bco brgyad kyi rdul phra
353a7(mdo sde2): rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gsheg
353a8(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
353b1(mdo sde2): med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ nges par song ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la
353b2(mdo sde2): sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
353b3(mdo sde2): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'dzin
353b4(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams yod de de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon
353b5(mdo sde2): pa zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
353b6(mdo sde2): 'das pa na bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
353b7(mdo sde2): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas med par spyod ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa gcig gi
353b8(mdo sde2): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis
354a1(mdo sde2): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyugs char zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal/
354a2(mdo sde2): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i
354a3(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa'i lha
354a4(mdo sde2): zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
354a5(mdo sde2): pa na/ lhas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal
354a6(mdo sde2): shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
354a7(mdo sde2): na/ rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
354a8(mdo sde2): rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
354b1(mdo sde2): rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ ma smad ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sman
354b2(mdo sde2): gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig
354b3(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gzi
354b4(mdo sde2): brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyi rab tu rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnam
354b5(mdo sde2): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gso ba byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sher gyi phyogs char gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
354b6(mdo sde2): de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma spangs shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
354b7(mdo sde2): brjod du med pa bzhi cu rtsa bzhi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod
354b8(mdo sde2): de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char snang ba can zhes bya ba'i
355a1(mdo sde2): 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rtsegs zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam
355a2(mdo sde2): dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ grags
355a3(mdo sde2): can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi pa bya bar shes so// 'jam
355a4(mdo sde2): dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ gzi brjid can zhes
355a5(mdo sde2): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs
355a6(mdo sde2): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig
355a7(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs
355a8(mdo sde2): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
355b1(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
355b2(mdo sde2): nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen sgo zhes bya
355b3(mdo sde2): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar phyogs
355b4(mdo sde2): kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi rdul phra rab kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
355b5(mdo sde2): yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dkar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas
355b6(mdo sde2): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par sum bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin chen rtog shin tu
355b7(mdo sde2): rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes//
355b8(mdo sde2): so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'das pa na/
356a1(mdo sde2): shin tu mdzes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa
356a2(mdo sde2): zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum bcu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas
356a3(mdo sde2): kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang
356a4(mdo sde2): zhes bya ba shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
356a5(mdo sde2): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
356a6(mdo sde2): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs
356a7(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ nga la sems can gyis ming tha dad par shes pa'i brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang /
356a8(mdo sde2): shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de bzhin du phyogs chos thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can rnams
356b1(mdo sde2): kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes pa yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde/
356b2(mdo sde2): bar mi rig go// 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing tshad med pa thos na myos par
356b3(mdo sde2): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang zag theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
356b4(mdo sde2): dge ba'i bshes ga nyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang / 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tsom skyed par 'gyur na/ nyan
356b5(mdo sde2): thos kyi theg pa can dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal ngas mngon par
356b6(mdo sde2): shes pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol
356b7(mdo sde2): na yon tan gyi khams ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus mtha' yas
356b8(mdo sde2): shes bya ba'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga la ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa/
357a1(mdo sde2): brtson 'grus mtha' yas de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgya bcus yongasu skor bar 'gyur te/ byang chub
357a2(mdo sde2): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu med par zhugs nas/ theg pa brjod du
357a3(mdo sde2): med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa sha sta ga ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i
357a4(mdo sde2): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongasu dag pa mched de/ nga la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom
357a5(mdo sde2): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim 'gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
357a6(mdo sde2): med pa yongasasu dag pas thos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig/ ces de lta bu'i smon lam
357a7(mdo sde2): btab nas/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ btso
357a8(mdo sde2): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
357b1(mdo sde2): med pa yongs su dag par lung stan med kyi 'on kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongasu
357b2(mdo sde2): dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas/ de ltar ngas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/
357b3(mdo sde2): de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongasu dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
357b4(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyi mi lang 'khor ba na// bsam gyis mi khyab
357b5(mdo sde2): 'das pa'i dus// sangs rgyas zhing gis rgyas bskyed phyir// de na nga'i sa brtson 'grus brtsams// brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba// gang
357b6(mdo sde2): zag mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston// sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing // stobs
357b7(mdo sde2): rnams kyi yang pha rol byin// mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas// so so yang dag rig la mkhas// gnas dang gnas min dbang yang thob// las
357b8(mdo sde2): dang ye shes rtogs par rigs// las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang // rnam par smin la the tsom med// khams rnams du ma shes pa dang // rnam par
358a1(mdo sde2): / 'dren pa shin tu ldan// sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// sems can rnams kyi dbang po/
358a2(mdo sde2): yi// rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// dbang po mchog dang tha ma dang // ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan ye shes rnam mthar dang /
358a3(mdo sde2): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin// sgom par 'jug dang tshad med la// rkang gnyis dam par shin du bslab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin// de ni mi
358a4(mdo sde2): mkhyen gang yang med// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med// de bzhin gshegs pa de yangs pa// sangs rgyas
358a5(mdo sde2): zhing ni rgya dris te/ sangs rgyas zhing gi che ba nyid// bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // ma lus yang dag rab tu
358a6(mdo sde2): mkhyen/ gang rnams khyed kyis mi khyen pa/ de 'dra'i chos ni yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing gi skyon rnams dang // yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen//
358a7(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bo bshad du gsol// sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang // ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang brgyab// nyon mongs
358a8(mdo sde2): gang gis nyon mongs pas// mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor// mi rnams gang gi nyon mongs pa// nyon mongs de dag khyed kyis mkhyen// de'i las
358b1(mdo sde2): dang bsams pa rnams/ 'dren pa khyen gyis rnam par mkhyen// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang // byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang // ji ltar de las
358b2(mdo sde2): ldang ba rnams// ston pa khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa// ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang // zhi gnas dang ni
358b3(mdo sde2): lhag mthong rnams/ rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen// ji ltar chos la dogs pa dang // gang gis rkyen kyis bshad pa yang // de yang ston pa/
358b4(mdo sde2): rab mkhyen te// de nas the tshom mi mnga' khyed// khyed kyi skal pa bye sprod pas// ye shes 'di las nges par byung // stong pas stobs kyi mthu yang
358b5(mdo sde2): bsnyes// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan/ bskal pa stong phrag bye ba yis// bdag dang dar la rnams kyi yang // spyod pa dag tu ma mchis shing /
358b6(mdo sde2): bsam gyi mi khyab thams cad mkhyen/ gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skyes pa thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis// ji lta bu yang rab
358b7(mdo sde2): tu mkhyen// gang du ji 'drar skye ba dang // gang du rig kyang ci 'dra ba// ji ltar kun tu sprad pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tha ma'i chos
358b8(mdo sde2): rnams ci 'dra ba// 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang // 'gro ba gang du skye ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// ci 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis// sngan cad
359a1(mdo sde2): / rnam par lung bstan pa// mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pa// de la the tsom mi mngar khyod// tshul khrims gang dang cho ga gang // ji 'dra'i/
359a2(mdo sde2): spyod pa spyad pa dang // ye shes gang la zhugs pa yang // de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dang gang gi las kyis su// skye ba rnam smin ci
359a3(mdo sde2): 'dra thob pa yang // de dag mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/ gang du gnas pa de dag gi/ rgyun tu mchi bar nges pa yang // de yang khyed kyi ma lus mkhyen// de slad
359a4(mdo sde2): yid gnyis mi mnga' khyed// gang gi lus kyis sems gang skyes// de yang khyed kyis rnam par mkhyen// sems de rgyu ni gang lags pas// de yang
359a5(mdo sde2): 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen// sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni// khyod dang 'dra ba yang ma mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams dang // 'dren pa khyod
359a6(mdo sde2): ni de dang 'dra// srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams// rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen// de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ 'dren pa'i ye shes
359a7(mdo sde2): dmyigs mi mnga'// gang dang gang gi lus kyis su// ji lta bu'i rgyun tu mchi// de yang thams cad mkhyen pas khyen// de slad rgyal las lhag
359a8(mdo sde2): ma mchis// 'dren pas chos thams cad la// khyod ni the tsom yod mi mnga'/ sems can kun gyi spyod yul yang // sangs rgyas sman gyis rab
359b1(mdo sde2): tu gzigs// skye ba dang ni 'phos mkhyen// khyod 'dra ba ni yod mi mnga'// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na// thub pa khyod las ma
359b2(mdo sde2): mchis so// zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen// ma lus par yang rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs thams cad yongasu sbyangs// khyod kyis bkra
359b3(mdo sde2): chags kun kyang bcom// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang // spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen// gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang // nyon mongs 'di dag
359b4(mdo sde2): gar 'gyur mkhyen// nyon mongs dag la spyod pas na// bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te// de las khyod ni pha rol
359b5(mdo sde2): phyin// bdag dang pha rol phyin rnams kyi// nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yis// lam de rnams ni rab tu mkhyen// de slad khyod ni las la mkhas// 'jig
359b6(mdo sde2): rten kun don rnams 'dren pa// mtha' yas brtson 'grus de ston nas// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par// 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas
359b7(mdo sde2): lha ris nga skyes te// rtag par lha'i dbang por gyur/ bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la/ rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bsten// lha'i gnas nas shi
359b8(mdo sde2): 'phos te// mi yi dbang po rgyal bar gyur// sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan// de dag nga'i chos thos nas// /
360a1(mdo sde2): sti stang mtshungs med skyed nas su/ sems kyi thams cad nyer zhag te// dri med sems kyis de dag nyan// sems can bye ba mtha'
360a2(mdo sde2): yas pa// byang chub mchog la nges par gyur// nga'i tshig thos rtogs pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas
360a3(mdo sde2): pa// sangs rgyas zhing gis brgya bshad kyang // bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su// rgya che bshad pa mi zad do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod pa/
360a4(mdo sde2): drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin ston par bshad// de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan// gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang /
360a5(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang // bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pas// gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs
360a6(mdo sde2): bshad// zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi snyed// gang la bshad pa de yang stong // 'di la mgon med 'gro ba myos// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta
360a7(mdo sde2): bu blo gros mtha' yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyis tshig su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod
360a8(mdo sde2): nas/ bud med kyi dbang po las gyur te// de phyin chad bud med kyis lus su mi skye bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
360b1(mdo sde2): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongasu sbyang bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
360b2(mdo sde2): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpe'i rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o chos kyi rnam grangs
360b3(mdo sde2): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu 'gul/ g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg
360b4(mdo sde2): rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/ khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur// chem chem rab tu chem chem kun
360b5(mdo sde2): tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho// shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma'
360b6(mdo sde2): na lho phyogs mtho// dbus dma' na mtha' tho// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// srog chag bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum bcu rtsa drug len pa med par/
360b7(mdo sde2): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge snyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
360b8(mdo sde2): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog
361a1(mdo sde2): chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye gu sngon sems ma skyed pa rnams ni bla na med pa yab
361a2(mdo sde2): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri gzhi stong
361a3(mdo sde2): po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
361a4(mdo sde2): pa la mngon par stod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
361a5(mdo sde2): rgya gar gyi mkhan mo na mi tra dang / su ran tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo rtsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas/ slad kyi
361a6(mdo sde2): gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bi ma
361a7(mdo sde2): la kar te/ nir ti sha na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pas grangs pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
361a8(mdo sde2): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi dang ma byon pa thams cad
361b1(mdo sde2): la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i grong khyer na a spu srung ba'i tshal na/ dge slong rgya stong
361b2(mdo sde2): gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thabs cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang
361b3(mdo sde2): ldan par gyur ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed
361b4(mdo sde2): pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rje su thob pa srid par kun tu spor ba/ yongs su zad pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu
361b5(mdo sde2): rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs
361b6(mdo sde2): gcig ste/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po yongasu spangs pa las nges par
361b7(mdo sde2): byung ba sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis rlabs dang / chos kyi grong khyer srung ba/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po yongs su
361b8(mdo sde2): phyogs bcur sgra shin tu grags pa/ ma gsol par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi
362a1(mdo sde2): 'chad par byed pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyi mi non pa/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung
362a2(mdo sde2): phun sum tshogs pa sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi
362a3(mdo sde2): ma chad pa/ sbran pa dang / dul ba dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
362a4(mdo sde2): shes rab dang / thabs las byung ba dang / mi dmigs pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi rgal ba'i chos kyis 'khor lo//
362a5(mdo sde2): bskor ba/ mtshan nyid med par phyag rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'khor thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa/
362a6(mdo sde2): bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa dang / gzugs dam
362a7(mdo sde2): pa 'dzin pa rgyan dang bral ba/ ri rab kyi rtse mo 'phags pa bzhin du grags pa dang / brjod pa shin tu mthong ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra bas/ sangs
362a8(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi chos la mi phyed pa'i dad pas rab tu rnyed pa'i chos rin po che'i 'od gzer las/ bdud rtsi'i char nga shin tu 'bebs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi
362b1(mdo sde2): skad dang / smra ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra rnams par dag pa'i dbyangs/ chos zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug cing mtha'
362b2(mdo sde2): dang / mtha' med par lta ba'i bag chags kyi mtshams spor ba kun bcod pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra mngon par sgrogs pa/ mtshungs pa dang
362b3(mdo sde2): mi tshungs pa las shin tu 'das pa/ chos rin po che shes rab dang / mos tshan pa chags mas dang / bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i ded dpon chen
362b4(mdo sde2): po// dran pa dang / zhi ba dang / phra ba dang / 'jam pa dang / blta dka' ba dang / rtog par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ sems can
362b5(mdo sde2): 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs pa'i rje su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thams cad
362b6(mdo sde2): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang bskur bas dbang skur ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag pa'i bsam/
362b7(mdo sde2): bas zhugs pa ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang / ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 'obs thams cad las rgal ba dang / bsam bzhin du srid par 'gro ba'i skye
362b8(mdo sde2): bar ston pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rtogs pa/
363a1(mdo sde2): ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyar ba rab tu sbyor ba/ yon tan mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas
363a2(mdo sde2): kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ mthong ba dang / thos pa 'bras bu yod pa/ gom pa 'dor ba 'bras
363a3(mdo sde2): bu yod pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yon tan yongs brjod kyang / yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas par rtog pa
363a4(mdo sde2): la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lta zhes bya ba dang / mnyam mi mnyam lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams par sprul pa'i
363a5(mdo sde2): rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang phyugs dang / chos kyi rtog dang / 'od kyi rtog dang / 'od bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang / bkod
363a6(mdo sde2): pa chen po dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rtag tu lag
363a7(mdo sde2): bkang dang / rtag tu lag btegs dang / rtag tu gdung dang / rtag tu dga' dgong dbang po dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /
363a8(mdo sde2): lha'i rgyal po dang / smon lam la zhags pas sbyin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu bsgrags pa thob dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang /
363b1(mdo sde2): rin chen sgrom ma 'dzin dang / rin po che dpa' dang / rin chen dga' dang / rin chen dpal dang / mig 'phrul can dang / dra ba can gyi 'od
363b2(mdo sde2): dang / dmigs pa med pa'i bsam btan dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rin chen gtong dang / bdud 'jom dang / glog gi lha dang / rnam par
363b3(mdo sde2): 'byung ba'i rgyal po dang / mtshan brtsegs yang dag 'das dang / seng ge'i nga ro mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyings dang / ri'i rtse mo kun tu 'jom pa'i
363b4(mdo sde2): rgyal po dang spos kyi glang po che dang / spos kyi bal glang po che dang / rtag tu 'bad dang / brtson pa mi 'dor dang / rab kyi blo gros dang / mdzes par skyes dang /
363b5(mdo sde2): pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / pad mo dkod pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / tshangs pa'i dra ba can dang / rin po
363b6(mdo sde2): che man kar can dang / bdud las rgyal dang zhing snyoms rgyan dang / nor bu rin chen grags dang / gtsug na gser dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / byams pa dang
363b7(mdo sde2): 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa dang / de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ngo // gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med
363b8(mdo sde2): pa nas tshangs pa ral can las stsogs pa tshangs pa khri/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
364a1(mdo sde2): lhags pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so// gling chen po bzhi pa so so nas kyang brgya byin khri nyis stong lhags te/ de dag kyang 'a'o/
364a2(mdo sde2): de nyid du 'dus so// de bzhin du gzhan yang dbang che bar grags pa'i tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
364a3(mdo sde2): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur to// de bzhin du
364a4(mdo sde2): 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge brnyan ma rnams kyang der lhags te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi snying
364a5(mdo sde2): po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su skor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos ston te rgya mtsho'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab mngon
364a6(mdo sde2): par 'phags pa bzhin du 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ lham me lhan na lha nger dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub
364a7(mdo sde2): sems dpa' lid tsa byi gzhon nu/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas lid tsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs nas/ yangs pa'i
364a8(mdo sde2): grong khyer chen po nas byung ste a mra bsrung ba'i tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/
364b1(mdo sde2): mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas rin po che'i bdugs ji lta bu thogs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan
364b2(mdo sde2): 'das la mngon par bskyabs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rin po che'i bdugs de dag phul ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rin po
364b3(mdo sde2): che'i bdugs de dag gcig tu gyur te/ rin po che'i bdugs de dag gcig tu gyur te/ rin po che'i bdugs des stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
364b4(mdo sde2): khams 'di thams cad khebs par snang ngo // stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu zhing de dag kyang rin po che'i bdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang
364b5(mdo sde2): na snang ngo // stong sum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod rnams dang / gangs kyi ri dang / ri btang zung dang / ri
364b6(mdo sde2): btang zung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldan pa dang / rin po che'i ri dang / ri nag po dang 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / de dag thams cad kyang
364b7(mdo sde2): rin po'i bdugs de nyid kyi nang la snang ngo // stong sum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po gang dag yod pa rnams dang / mtsho dang /
364b8(mdo sde2): dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang / lu ma 'bab pa de dag thams cad kyang / rin po che'i gdugs de nyid nang na snang ngo //
365a1(mdo sde2): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang dang skar ma'i gzugs dang / lha'i gnas
365a2(mdo sde2): dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams dang
365a3(mdo sde2): rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rin
365a4(mdo sde2): po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos ston pa gang byung ba de yang
365a5(mdo sde2): rin po che'i bdugs chen po gcig po las byung bar grag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
365a6(mdo sde2): 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu nas yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi
365a7(mdo sde2): 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod do// de nas li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas
365a8(mdo sde2): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbar bu btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa
365b1(mdo sde2): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gtsang zhing mdzes pa pad ma'i 'dab ltar yang ba'i spyan// dgongs pa dag cing zhi gnas pha rol tu phyin mchog/
365b2(mdo sde2): brnyes// dge ba'i las bstsogs yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang // dge sbyong zhi ba'i las 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa'i
365b3(mdo sde2): rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing mchog rab gsal kun kyang gda'// khyod kyis chos kyi bka' mching rgya chen 'chi med 'gro/
365b4(mdo sde2): de dag thams cad na mkha' 'di yi dkyil nas gda'// khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal srid mchog 'di chos kyi rgyal// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i rnams la chos kyi nor
365b5(mdo sde2): kyang bskul// chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa/ chos kyis dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchis pa
365b6(mdo sde2): pa ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma lags dang / chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas 'byung ba dang / 'di la bdag med tshor ba po dang byed med
365b7(mdo sde2): cing // dge sdig las ni ci'ang chung mi za zhes gsung gi ston// thu dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas/ byang chub mchog
365b8(mdo sde2): rab zhi pa mi 'chi bde ba brnyes// de la tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba med/ mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyi de mi rtogs// rmang byung chos
366a1(mdo sde2): kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du// lan sum bzlas pa chos kyi 'khor lo rnams mang po// shin tu zhi ba rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor//
366a2(mdo sde2): de tshe dkon mchog gsum po dag nye bar bstan// khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyis legs par gang btul ba// de dag rtog par mi mchis rtag par
366a3(mdo sde2): rab tu zhi// khyod ni skye rga na 'chi mthar byin sman pa'i mchog/ yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang la mgos phyag 'tshal// sti stang legs par bgyis pas
366a4(mdo sde2): mi bskyod ri rab bzhin// tshul khrims 'tshal la mtshungs par rab tu byams// mnyam pa nyid la zhugs shing thugs kyang na mkha' bzhin// sems can
366a5(mdo sde2): dkon mchog 'di la su zhi mchod mi bgyis// thub pa chen po'i 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ni// khyod kyi zhal du rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis lta// thams
366a6(mdo sde2): cad kyi kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdun nar mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs gcig rab tu bsgru ba yang/
366a7(mdo sde2): 'khor rnams kyi ni gsung la tha dad rnam par rig/ 'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa// de ni rgyal ba ma 'dres sangs rgyas ma lagaso// gsungs
366a8(mdo sde2): cig rab tu bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de yis ni/ kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtogs par byas// som nyi 'tshal ba 'dren pa rab tu zhi mdzad de/ de ni
366b1(mdo sde2): rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lagaso// stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la/
366b2(mdo sde2): phyag 'tshal lo// ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams nges par rab rtogs pa// 'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// kun tu sbyor ba'i bcings
366b3(mdo sde2): pa gcod la phyag 'tsha lo// pha rol phyin nas skam la zhugs la phyag 'tshalo// dub pa 'gro ba sgrol ba khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor ba'i 'gro bar mi gnas
366b4(mdo sde2): pa la phyag 'tshalo// sems can rnam dang 'gro bar bzhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang // 'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs// pad ma dag ni
366b5(mdo sde2): chu skyes chu yis yongs mi gos/ thub pa'i pad mas stong pa nyid ni nges par bsgoms/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rab tu bskul/ khyod ni ci yang smon par
366b6(mdo sde2): mdzad pa yongs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas dag gis mthun chen bsam gyis mi khyab ste// na mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom
366b7(mdo sde2): ldan 'das la li rtsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis// tshigasu bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
366b8(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das li tsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di dag
367a1(mdo sde2): kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' 'di
367a2(mdo sde2): dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog
367a3(mdo sde2): 'byang gnas la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so legaso// gzhon nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa las brtsams te/ de bzhin gsheg
367a4(mdo sde2): pa la dri ba legs so// de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag
367a5(mdo sde2): pa las brtsams te/ ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / li tsa byi lnga
367a6(mdo sde2): brgya po de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can gyi zhing ni byang chub sems
367a7(mdo sde2): dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du sems can rnams la rgyas par byed pa tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
367a8(mdo sde2): 'dzin to// sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug par ji lta bur
367b1(mdo sde2): sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji
367b2(mdo sde2): lta bur sems can rnams 'phags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu 'dzin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang
367b3(mdo sde2): chub sems dpa' rnam kyi zhing ni sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro// dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di lta ste/ dper na na mkha' la ji lta bur bya ba 'dod
367b4(mdo sde2): ba de bzhin du byed mod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni byar mi rung zhing / brgyan du yang mi rung ba de bzhin du dkon mchog 'byung gnas chos thams cad na mkha' dang
367b5(mdo sde2): mtshungs par shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu bya bar 'dod pa de lta bur sangs
367b6(mdo sde2): rgyas kyi zhing byed mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mkha' ni byar mi rung ngo // brgyan du mi rung ngo // dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'on kyang bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub
367b7(mdo sde2): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can g.yo med pa dang sgyu med pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// rig/
367b8(mdo sde2): kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshogs thams cad
368a1(mdo sde2): bstsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas zhing ste/ de byang chub thob
368a2(mdo sde2): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rgya chen
368a3(mdo sde2): po sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
368a4(mdo sde2): sbyin pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub sems thob pa'i sems kyi zhing der/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su gtong
368a5(mdo sde2): bo'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpe'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste// de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
368a6(mdo sde2): kyi zhing der/ bsam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su srung ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol
368a7(mdo sde2): du phyin pa'i sems can rnams skye 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drir
368a8(mdo sde2): dge ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sems can skye bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
368b1(mdo sde2): kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
368b2(mdo sde2): shes rab kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing te/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnam
368b3(mdo sde2): skye bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems/
368b4(mdo sde2): dpa'i byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams
368b5(mdo sde2): ni byang chub sems dpa'i sepas rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rnam par grol ba thams cad kyi yongs su zin pa'i sems
368b6(mdo sde2): can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// thabs la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyasra zhing der thabs dang
368b7(mdo sde2): dpyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i
368b8(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
369a1(mdo sde2): ba dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam bsgrub pa dang / shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// /
369a2(mdo sde2): yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyis
369a3(mdo sde2): rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// mi khom brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
369a4(mdo sde2): kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing mi khom pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas shing pha rol gyis ltung
369a5(mdo sde2): ba mi dge ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste// de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ltung ba'i sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// dge/
369a6(mdo sde2): ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nges pa dang longs
369a7(mdo sde2): spyod che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshigs gis brgyan pa dang / ngag 'jam pa dang / 'khor mi phyed pa dang / dbye/
369a8(mdo sde2): khe snum pa la mkhas pa dang / phrag dog dang bral ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
369b1(mdo sde2): skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems skyed pa ci 'dra bar bsam pa yang de 'dra'o// bsam pa ci 'dra ba
369b2(mdo sde2): sbyor ba yang de 'dra'o// sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang de snyed do// lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed par nges par sems pa yang de snyed do// /
369b3(mdo sde2): nges par sems pa ji snyed par sgrub pa yang de snyed do// sgrub pa ji snyed par yongs su bsngo bar 'ang de snyed do// yongs su bsngo ba ji snyed par thabs
369b4(mdo sde2): rnams kyang de snyed do// thabs rnams ji snyed par zhing yongasu bsngo ba'ang de snyed do// zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su dag
369b5(mdo sde2): ba yang de bzhin no// sems can yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes yongasu dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
369b6(mdo sde2): bstan pa yongasu dag pa yang de bzhin no// bstan pa yongasu dag pa yang ji lta ba bzhin ye shes bsgrubs pa yongasu dag pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes
369b7(mdo sde2): bsgrubs pa yongasu dag pa ji bzhin du rang gi sems yong su dag pa yang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
369b8(mdo sde2): yongs su dag par byed 'dod pas rang gi sems su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag
370a1(mdo sde2): pa de 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam tu/
370a2(mdo sde2): sems te/ gal te ji lta bur sems yongasu dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
370a3(mdo sde2): shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na sems can yongs su ma dag gam ci na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag par snang snyam mo// de nas
370a4(mdo sde2): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyi mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
370a5(mdo sde2): to// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam ci na dmus long dag gis mi mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
370a6(mdo sde2): ma lags so// de ni dmus long gis nongs kyis nyi ma dang zla bas ni ma nongs so// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin/
370a7(mdo sde2): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa mi mthong ba de ni/ sems can rnams kyi mi shes pas nyes kyis/ de la de bzhin gshegs
370a8(mdo sde2): pas nyes pa ni ma yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag mod kyi khyod kyis de mi mthong ngo // de nas tshangs pa
370b1(mdo sde2): ral pa can gyis gnas rten shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag go/
370b2(mdo sde2): zhes ma zer cig/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu gzhan 'phral
370b3(mdo sde2): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa'ang kho bos de 'dra bar mthong
370b4(mdo sde2): ngo // de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bus/ tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'di dman dang / tsher
370b5(mdo sde2): ma dang / g.yang sa dang / ri'i rtse mo dang ngan grogs/ 'jig ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo // tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar
370b6(mdo sde2): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong ba ni btsun pa sha ri'i bu/ sems la mthong dman yod cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam
370b7(mdo sde2): ba yongs su ma dag par nges so// gang dag btsun pa sha ri'i bu sems can thams cad las sems mnyam zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsam pa yod
370b8(mdo sde2): su dag pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par mthong ngo // de bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
371a1(mdo sde2): rten gyi khams 'di la zhabs mthe bos snun pa dang / bsnun ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma rtsegs pa dang /
371a2(mdo sde2): rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dang rin po che brgya stong du mar so sor bkod par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod
371a3(mdo sde2): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra'o// de nas thams cad dang ldan
371a4(mdo sde2): pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing bdag nyid kyang rin po che'i pad mo bkod pa'i stan la 'dug snyam byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
